column5: Late yesterday afternoon I was Pm'd by Bigugli enquiring if I was at home and could he drop by as he was in the area, I replied "of course."  A short while later he arrives with his lovely wife and procedes to hand me a bag of perch fillets and some of his home made salsa, lucky me.  Looks like a big fish dinner for me and the kids tomorrow. Can't thank you enough for your generousity Bruce.  It was great to see you again and have a chat with you and your wife, you now know where I live, doors always open!
Was a pleasure to be able to share.
mmmmm, perch & salsa !!!!  Good onya Bruce

Many a member has spoken highy to me about both of you guys, and its nice to see the truth in that. This is just another chapter in the book of OFC. I am proud to be a member here,in this community of generous men and women. Bruce.... Chris

Every once in a while I like to cover my fillets with 1/4 cup of salsa, 1/4 cup of white table wine, a splash of soy sauce, salt and pepper then bake in a 400*F oven for 15 -20 minutes until they flake easily...usually served on a bed of rice and with a salad...
Oh boy, that doesn't sound good at all Norm....  Now I have a dilemma!
